text: The Malacca Sultanate Palace Museum is in Malacca City, Malacca, Malaysia. It is a modern reconstruction of the Malacca Sultanate palace, based on the Malay Annals. It was built in 1984 and became a cultural museum showcasing the region's history. The museum was officially opened on 17 July 1986 by Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad. ==References== Category:1986 establishments in Asia Category:1980s establishments in Malaysia Category:Buildings and structures in Malacca Category:Museums in Malaysia Category:Malacca City
title: Malacca Sultanate Palace Museum
